name: かぞえ飯
description:
.
Mouse movement moves the chopsticks.
With the left mouse click, you can lower the chopsticks.
If you are not holding the rice with the chopsticks, you can hold the rice with the chopsticks by placing the chopsticks down on top of the rice.
If you are holding the rice, you can place the rice where the chopsticks are down.
　*The trick is to use the shadow as a guide to bring the chopsticks down where you want them.
